content: this simple crochet basket pattern is perfect for adding a unique touch to your home decor made with either bulky or super bulky yarn it is perfect for storing just about anything pattern includes written instructions photos and the graph for adding the word create using cross stitch it is perfect for advanced beginners to intermediate crocheters written in us terms you will need approximately 200 yards of bulky or 315 yards of super bulky yarn i used red heart soft essentials for the off white basket bernat softee chunky for the white grey and black basket and lion brand wool ease thick and quick for the oatmeal mustard and charcoal basket crochet hook size h 5 00mm or size needed to obtain gauge stitch marker tapestry needle and scissors 10-20 yards of worsted weight yarn in a contrasting color if adding cross stitch to the basket *the free version of this pattern is available here 1 1 https //www meghanmakesdo com/blog/a-simple-crochet-basket-free-crochet-pattern
